data.subject: Happy New Year!!
data.message: The road to success is no straight. There is a curve called FAILURE, a loop called CONFUSION, speed bumps called FRIENDS, red lights called ENEMIES, caution lights called FAMILY. You will have flats called JOBS. But, if you have a spare called DETERMINATION, an engine called PERSEVERANCE, insurance called FAITH, a driver called DISCIPLINE you will make it to a place called SUCCESS. Looking forward to our continuous friendship in 2011. Happy New Year!
